note: A husband, father, actor, director, & a climate justice advocate with an eye out for a better, brighter, cleaner, & more hopeful future for all of us.

EFF's mastodon presence, please visit us at https://www.eff.org. Do not message this account with confidential information or to seek legal assistance; for legal help email info@eff.org or visit https://www.eff.org/pages/legal-assistance

note: Author. Scientist. Host of PBS Serving Up Science. ‘24-25 International Affairs Fellow in the U.S. Senate. Sustainability, Politics & Science Communication. #HistoryRemix for stories of diverse trailblazers in science & the arts. #SharedPlanet to explore biodiversity
Cartoonist, “Tom the Dancing Bug” 2-time Pulitzer Prize Finalist, Herblock Prize, RFK Journalism Award, Berryman Award, #1 Dad Coffee Mug Owner
